content: designed for the 2014 winter games **this is such a quick knit that you could actually make one during the opening ceremonies - approx 2 hours ** you can either knit flat or in the round whichever you prefer instructions for both there are also two variations given for the cuff reverse stockintte or garter stitch ----------------------------- my daughter is called lara and yes i have seen dr zhivago an awful lot of times so this had to be many thanks to the testers paulap covelady xstitch sunny434
